Articles.Content: I have built a superglider and i can launch it without using engines. I just need to hold "S" and it will accelerate until launch. Is this a glitch or is this a easter egg or a feature?
It's the infi-glide glitch where you can fly forever.

It's the infi-glide glitch where you can fly forever.

Tell me more about it.
Basically, the aerodynamic model for this game is borked.

Basically, the aerodynamic model for this game is borked.

Does this work for all planes?
You're creating (or at least deviating) lift by moving the control surface, which accelerates you in a certain direction. By moving these surfaces repeatedly, you can accelerate to tremendous speeds.

It's the magic turbine bug. While the command module's free torque and the control surfaces certainly amplify the effect Trebuchet-Launch did some experiments during the rocket glider challenge and found that the effect seems to exist even on unmanned parts using static wings: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17857-The-Rocket-Javelin-Challenge%21?p=246748&viewfull=1#post246748

Floating point numbers and the force multiplier effect of wings possibly?
